title: Clubs want to print the Boiler Plate language on contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in view or edit mode on a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'print' to the left of edit/save buttons
custom_expected: THEN pdf will populate in new tab

title: Club Spanish-speaking players want to see boiler plate language translated to Spanish
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has selected 'Spanish' in the language field on a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Print'
custom_expected:
THEN PDF should generate in a new tab translated into Spanish
AND translation should follow the English version

title: Club can print Addendum A of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills out an Addendum A
AND user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum A should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND all behavior listed in the Report Details should be met
AND the layout follows the template
AND fields not yet filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum B - Minor League Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Minor League Terms to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Minor League Terms should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank
AND Minor League Terms should be in numerical order starting from I.

title: Club can print Addendum B - Termination Pay Clauses
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Termination Pay to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Termination Pay should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank
AND Termination Pay clauses should be in numerical order starting from I.

title: Club can print Addendum B - Major League Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Major League Terms to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Major League Terms should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank
Major League Terms should be in numerical order starting from I.

title: Club can print Addendum B clauses with Roman Numerals
custom_steps: WHEN user prints a minor contract
custom_expected:
THEN Minor League Terms selected should appear in numerical order
AND Termination Pay should have the roman numeral after the roman numeral of last minor league terms
AND Major League Terms should be in numerical order starting from I.

title: As a club, I want to print Addendum B Header/footer of the contract
custom_steps:
Reference
Link to Template: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044
Link to Sample https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044

Accâ€‹eptance Criteria
â€¢When user hits Print, Addendum B header and footer is generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented.
â€¢All behavior listed in template link for Addendum B header and footer should be met
â€¢The Addendum B header and footer should be laid out as shown in template
â€¢If any 1 or more addendum B has been checked, then add a page break after the footer â€œNo Other Provisionsâ€￾.

title: Club can print Addendum C of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank
AND Add C prints on its own page
AND fits on one page

title: Club can print Addendums E, F, G, H
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters an Addendum E, F, G, and H
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum E, F, G, and H should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Life Insurance section
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a Life Insurance section
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Life Insurance Consent should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can have page numbering
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN the contract should have page number starting at page 1 as shown in the [sample](https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044)
AND Addendums C, E, F and G should each be one page
AND start on their own page
AND other addendums should begin on the same page unless less then 1/4 of the page is remainng

title: As a Spanish player, I want my contract to be translated in Spanish
custom_steps: WHEN user prints a minor contract
custom_expected:
THEN If the "Language" field on the Player profile- Info tab is set to Spanish, then hitting Print should generate a PDF that also has the Spanish translation of most sections on the contract
AND Follow template and sample for sections in Spanish.
AND Some clauses are new to EBIS 2 like Addendum E for which language has been provided. For Addendum B, all language must come from EBIS 1 unless specified otherwise.

title: UAT feedback - Adjust size, bolding, positioning of e-signature on single Addendum Cs
custom_steps: WHEN user prints a single Addendum C
custom_expected:
THEN All signatures and date stamps on the Addendum C (Player, club and BOC) must be the same size - slightly bigger than the main font on the rest of the page
AND Dates must all be in the same font, and same format.  eg. mm/dd/yyyy for all.

title: Club can print Execution of Contract
As a club, I want to print Addendum A of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print,
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum A is generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented.
AND All behavior listed in Report Details for Addendum A should be met
AND Data on printed Addendum A should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND The Addendum A should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND Any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND Any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again

title: As a club, I want to print Addendum B of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print
custom_expected:
THEN , Addendum  B is generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented. Each clause prints only if it was toggled to YES on the contract
AND All behavior listed in Report Details for Addendum  B should be met
AND Data on printed Addendum  B should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND Each term should be in Roman Numerical order
AND The Addendum  B should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND Any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND Any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again
AND Either Dual Sport, Signing Bonus, or neither will appear on contract, but not both

title: As a club, I want to print Addendum C of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print,
custom_expected:
Addendum C is generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented.
THEN All behavior listed in Report Details for Addendum C should be met
AND Data on printed Addendum C should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND The Addendum C should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND Any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND Addendum C needs to print on its own page and fit on one page.
AND Any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again

title: As a club, I want to print Addendum F and G of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum  F, G, are generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented if the addendum has been selected
AND All behavior listed in Report Details for Addendums should be met
AND Data on printed Addendums should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND The Addendums should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND Any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF

title: As a club, I want to print the Life Insurance section of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print
custom_expected:
Life Insurance Consent is generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented.
AND All behavior listed in Report Details for Life Insurance Consent should be met
AND Data on printed Life Insurance Consent should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND The Life Insurance Consent should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND Any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND Any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again

title: As a club, I want to print Execution of Contract of the contract
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Link to Template: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347867?projectId=14044
Liâ€‹nk to Report details: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347866?projectId=14044

**Accâ€‹eptance Criteria**
â€¢When user hits Print, Execution of Contract is generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented.
â€¢All behavior listed in Report Details for Execution of Contract should be met except for any E-sig related notes, parental consent and commissioners stamping
â€¢Data on printed Execution of Contract should match with what was entered into EBIS.
â€¢The Execution of Contract should be laid out as shown in the template.
â€¢Any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
â€¢If English only, then it should fit on one page.  
â€¢There should be space left for Commissioner's stamp section at the bottom of the page.
â€¢Any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again

title: As a club, I want my contract to have page numbering
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
Sample contract: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347869?projectId=14044

**Acceptance Criteria**
- The contract should have page numbering starting at page 1 as shown in the sample.
- Note that each contract can be a different length based on what was or wasn't included.
- Addendums that should be one page are: Addendum C, F, G
- Addendums that should start on a new page are: Addendum C, F, G
- Addendums should begin on the same page unless less than 1/4 of the page is remaining

title: As a club, I want to print the Boiler Plate language on my contract
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
Sample: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347909?projectId=14044

**Reference**
Contract button state:
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2346965?projectId=14044

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Add the Print button to the contract in both view and edit mode. It is to the left of the EDIT/SAVE buttons. 
- Hitting Print should generate a PDF of the contract in a new tab
- If player's language is Spanish, also print Spanish version of language
- For this story we can ignore the page numbering

Note:
- This story will also be pointed for any initial framework to begin the printing MNC piece
- Boiler plate languages really only changes once every 4 years with a new CBA agreement

title: As a Spanish player, I want to see boiler plate language translated to Spanish on my contract
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
Sample Contract (minor non-first year international). See pages 20 - 29 of contract for spanish version of boiler plate language:
https://u8r.jamacloâ€‹ud.com/perspective.râ€‹eq#/items/2347185?prâ€‹ojectId=14044
- Just the language:
https://u8r.jamacloâ€‹ud.com/perspective.râ€‹eq#/items/2346965?prâ€‹ojectId=14044

**Acceptance Criteria**
- If the "Language" field on the Player profile- Info tab is set to Spanish, then hitting Print should generate a PDF that also has the Spanish translation of the boiler plate language.
- Spanish translation should follow the English version as shown in attached sample.
- For this story, ignore page numbering

Note
- For QA, if player info tab is not yet built by the time this story is delivered, then cross check with Ebis 1
